titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United Nations should forthwith take the procedural actions necessary to amend Article 23 of the Charter of the United Nations to establish India as a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United Nations should amend Article 23 of the U.N. Charter to establish India as a permanent member of the U.N. Security Council.
